ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this course, especially if you enjoy having a flexible schedule in terms of when you complete the assignments. The speakers change year to year, so you might look at the syllabus and consider whether the speakers match your interests. There is the opportunity to have lunch with each of the speakers after every class. The final paper (8000-10000 words) is incredibly long, start working on it early on and pick a topic that you are really interested in.
Yes, I would recommend this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Increased exposure to primarily academics working in global health. I would recommend getting more global health practitioners to present next year; that would be more relevant to my profession in public health.
